titleStmt.title: The holy sinner a tractate meditated on some passages of the storie of the penitent woman in the Pharisees house. by [sic] W.H.
titleStmt.author: Hodson, William, fl. 1625-1640.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Crooke in Paules Church yard,

notesStmt.note: The titlepage is engraved and signed: "W Marshall sculp:".
Caption title on page 1 and running title: S̀ancta peccatrix.̀
The final leaves contain various dedicatory verses and an imprimatur leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books, Tract Supplement reel E3 a fragment with frontis. and title page only.
